properties.name: example.http.meetnet-vlaamse-banken.poll-interval
properties.description: The amount of milliseconds between two fetches of data.

properties.name: example.weather.wind-speed
properties.description: The threshold of the wind speed that is acceptable.

properties.name: example.weather.wave-height
properties.description: The threshold of the wave height that is acceptable.

properties.name: example.weather.wind-direction.from
properties.description: The upperbound of the wind direction that is accaptable.

properties.name: example.weather.wind-direction.until
properties.description: The lower bound of the wind direction that is accaptable.
